text: Juan Morano Masa (5 December 1941 – 5 May 2018) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Madrid. Morano was a member of the Congress of Deputies from 2004 to 2015. He also served as the Mayor of León from 1979 to 1987 and from 1989 to 1995. Morano died in León on 5 May 2018 at the age of 76.Fallece Juan Morano, exalcalde de León, a los 76 años ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Spanish mayors Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: Juan Morano
